    "plugins": {
        "postcss-import": {},
        "postcss-url": {},
        "postcss-aspect-ratio-mini": {},
        "postcss-write-svg": {
            utf8: false
        },
        "postcss-cssnext": {},
        "postcss-px-to-viewport": {
            viewportWidth: 750, // (Number) è§†çª—çš„å®½åº¦ï¼Œå¯¹åº”çš„æ˜¯æˆ‘ä»¬è®¾è®¡ç¨¿çš„å®½åº¦ï¼Œä¸€èˆ¬æ˜¯750 
            viewportHeight: 1334, // (Number) è§†çª—çš„é«˜åº¦ï¼Œæ ¹æ®750è®¾å¤‡çš„å®½åº¦æ¥æŒ‡å®šï¼Œä¸€èˆ¬æŒ‡å®š1334ï¼Œä¹Ÿå¯ä»¥ä¸é…ç½®
            unitPrecision: 3, // (Number) æŒ‡å®š `px` è½¬æ¢ä¸ºè§†çª—å•ä½å€¼çš„å°æ•°ä½æ•°ï¼ˆå¾ˆå¤šæ—¶å€™æ— æ³•æ•´é™¤ï¼‰
            viewportUnit: 'vw', // (String) æŒ‡å®šéœ€è¦è½¬æ¢æˆçš„è§†çª—å•ä½ï¼Œå»ºè®®ä½¿ç”¨vw
            selectorBlackList: ['.ignore', '.hairlines'], // (Array) æŒ‡å®šä¸è½¬æ¢ä¸ºè§†çª—å•ä½çš„ç±»ï¼Œå¯ä»¥è‡ªå®šä¹‰ï¼Œå¯ä»¥æ— é™æ·»åŠ ,å»ºè®®å®šä¹‰ä¸€è‡³ä¸¤ä¸ªé€šç”¨çš„ç±»å
            minPixelValue: 1, // (Number) å°äºæˆ–ç­‰äº `1px` ä¸è½¬æ¢ä¸ºè§†çª—å•ä½ï¼Œä½ ä¹Ÿå¯ä»¥è®¾ç½®ä¸ºä½ æƒ³è¦çš„å€¼
            mediaQuery: false, // (Boolean) å…è®¸åœ¨åª’ä½“æŸ¥è¯¢ä¸­è½¬æ¢ `px`

            preset: "advanced",
            autoprefixer: false,

        }

}

        # vwå…¼å®¹æ–¹æ¡ˆ

        ä½¿ç”¨ viewport çš„ polyfill ï¼šViewport Units Buggyfillã€‚ä½¿ç”¨ viewport-units-buggyfill ä¸»è¦åˆ†ä»¥ä¸‹å‡ æ­¥èµ°ï¼š

        ç¬¬ä¸€æ­¥ï¼Œå¼•å…¥JavaScriptæ–‡ä»¶

        viewport-units-buggyfill ä¸»è¦æœ‰ä¸¤ä¸ªJavaScriptæ–‡ä»¶ï¼š viewport-units-buggyfill.js å’Œ viewport-units-buggyfill.hacks.js ã€‚ä½ åªéœ€è¦åœ¨ä½ çš„HTMLæ–‡ä»¶ä¸­å¼•å…¥è¿™ä¸¤ä¸ªæ–‡ä»¶ã€‚

        <script src="//g.alicdn.com/fdilab/lib3rd/viewport-units-buggyfill/0.6.2/??viewport-units-buggyfill.hacks.min.js,viewport-units-buggyfill.min.js"></script>

        ç¬¬äºŒæ­¥ï¼Œåœ¨HTMLæ–‡ä»¶ä¸­è°ƒç”¨ viewport-units-buggyfill ï¼Œæ¯”å¦‚ï¼š

        <script>
    window.onload = function() {
        window.viewportUnitsBuggyfill.init({
            hacks: window.viewportUnitsBuggyfillHacks
        });

        # vue.config.js

        æ ¹ç›®å½•ä¸‹æ–°å»º vue.config.js å¯é…ç½® proxy ã€ publicPath ã€ SourceMap ...

        è¯¦ç»†é…ç½®å‚è€ƒï¼švue.config.js

        // vue.config.js
module.exports = {
    // é€‰é¡¹...
    publicPath: './',
    outputDir: 'dist',
    productionSourceMap: true,
    devServer: {
        proxy: {
            '/api': {
                target: '<url>',
                ws: true,
                changeOrigin: true
            },
            '/foo': {
                target: '<other_url>'
            }
        }
    }
}

        # Api

        # æ¥å£

        é›†ä¸­ç®¡ç†apiæ¥å£, src/api/api.js

        /*
 * @Description: 
 * @Author: GaoHongwei
 * @LastEditors: GaoHongwei
 * @Date: 2019-02-21 16:17:23
 * @LastEditTime: 2020-04-24 12:02:03
 */
import {
    GET,
    POST,
    PUT,
    DELETE
} from './server.js'

const API_PATH = '/cmmc'

export default {
    //å‘é€éªŒè¯ç 
    getMCode(params) {
        return GET(API_PATH + '/passport/?l=reg.getMCode', params)
    },
    home(params) {
        return GET(API_PATH + '/seller/?l=usershop.home', params)
    },
}

        # axioså°è£…

        src/api/server.js

        import axios from 'axios';
import store from '../store'

const service = axios.create({
    withCredentials: true, //è¯·æ±‚æ˜¯å¦æºå¸¦æœ¬åœ°cookiesä¿¡æ¯
});

//http request æ‹¦æˆªå™¨
service.interceptors.request.use(
    config => {
        //token
        let signature = store.getters.signature
        if (signature) {
            config.headers.signature = signature
        }
        return config;
    },
    error => {
        return Promise.reject(error);
    }
);

//http response æ‹¦æˆªå™¨
service.interceptors.response.use(
    response => {
        let res = response.data
        return res;
    },
    error => {
        return Promise.reject(error)
    }
)

//å°è£…getè¯·æ±‚
export function GET(url, params = {}) {
    params.t = new Date().getTime(); //getæ–¹æ³•åŠ ä¸€ä¸ªæ—¶é—´å‚æ•°,è§£å†³ieä¸‹å¯èƒ½ç¼“å­˜é—®é¢˜.
    return service({
        url: url,
        method: 'get',
        headers: {},
        params
    })
}
//å°è£…postè¯·æ±‚
export function POST(url, data = {}, config) {
    //é»˜è®¤é…ç½® 
    let sendObject = {
        url: url,
        method: 'post',
        headers: {
            'Content-Type': 'application/json;charset=UTF-8'
        },
        data: data
    };
    Object.assign(sendObject, config);
    return service(sendObject)
}

//å°è£…putæ–¹æ³• (resfulAPIå¸¸ç”¨)
export function PUT(url, data = {}) {
    return service({
        url: url,
        method: 'put',
        headers: {
            'Content-Type': 'application/json;charset=UTF-8'
        },
        data: data
    })
}
//åˆ é™¤æ–¹æ³•(resfulAPIå¸¸ç”¨)
export function DELETE(url) {
    return service({
        url: url,
        method: 'delete',
        headers: {}
    })
}

        # ä½¿ç”¨ vue-router(è·¯ç”±)

        Vue Router æ˜¯ Vue.js å®˜æ–¹çš„è·¯ç”±ç®¡ç†å™¨ã€‚å®ƒå’Œ Vue.js çš„æ ¸å¿ƒæ·±åº¦é›†æˆï¼Œè®©æ„å»ºå•é¡µé¢åº”ç”¨å˜å¾—æ˜“å¦‚åæŒã€‚åŒ…å«çš„åŠŸèƒ½æœ‰ï¼š

        • åµŒå¥—çš„è·¯ç”±/è§†å›¾è¡¨
        • æ¨¡å—åŒ–çš„ã€åŸºäºç»„ä»¶çš„è·¯ç”±é…ç½®
        • è·¯ç”±å‚æ•°ã€æŸ¥è¯¢ã€é€šé…ç¬¦
        • åŸºäº Vue.js è¿‡æ¸¡ç³»ç»Ÿçš„è§†å›¾è¿‡æ¸¡æ•ˆæœ
        • ç»†ç²’åº¦çš„å¯¼èˆªæ§åˆ¶
        • å¸¦æœ‰è‡ªåŠ¨æ¿€æ´»çš„ CSS class çš„é“¾æ¥
        • HTML5 å†å²æ¨¡å¼æˆ– hash æ¨¡å¼ï¼Œåœ¨ IE9 ä¸­è‡ªåŠ¨é™çº§

        # å®‰è£…

        å®‰è£… vue-router

        npm install vue-router
# or
yarn add vue-router

        # åŸºæœ¬åº”ç”¨

        src ç›®å½•ä¸‹åˆ›å»º router æ–‡ä»¶å¤¹ï¼Œ router æ–‡ä»¶å¤¹ä¸‹åˆ›å»º index.js

        src
â”œâ”€â”€ router
â”‚   â””â”€â”€ index.js


        // index.js
import Vue from 'vue'
import Router from 'vue-router'
import store from '../store'
//è·¯ç”±æ‡’åŠ è½½
const Home = () => import('@/pages/home')
const My = () => import('@/pages/my')

Vue.use(Router)

const router = new Router({
    mode: 'hash',
    routes: [{
            path: '/',
            redirect: '/home',
        },
        {
            path: '/home',
            name: 'Home',
            component: Home,
            meta: {
                requiresAuth: false
            }
        },
        {
            path: '/my',
            name: 'My',
            component: My,
            meta: {
                requiresAuth: true
            }
        },
        {
            path: '*',
            component: Home
        }
    ]
})
//å…¨å±€å‰ç½®å®ˆå«
router.beforeEach((to, from, next) => {
    // console.log(from)
    // console.log(to)
    // metaå­—æ®µä¸­æ·»åŠ é…ç½®ä¿¡æ¯
    if (to.meta.requiresAuth && !store.getters.signature) {
        next({
            name: 'Login',
            query: {
                redirect: to.fullPath
            }
        })
    } else {
        next()
    }
})

export default router

        æ·»åŠ åˆ° main.js

        // main.js
import Vue from 'vue'
import App from './App.vue'
import router from './router'

Vue.config.productionTip = false

new Vue({
  render: h => h(App),
  router,
}).$mount('#app')

        # ä½¿ç”¨ Vuex(çŠ¶æ€ç®¡ç†)

        Redux æ˜¯ JavaScript çŠ¶æ€å®¹å™¨ï¼Œæä¾›å¯é¢„æµ‹åŒ–çš„çŠ¶æ€ç®¡ç†ã€‚Vuex æ˜¯ä¸€ä¸ªä¸“ä¸º Vue.js åº”ç”¨ç¨‹åºå¼€å‘çš„çŠ¶æ€ç®¡ç†æ¨¡å¼ã€‚å®ƒé‡‡ç”¨é›†ä¸­å¼å­˜å‚¨ç®¡ç†åº”ç”¨çš„æ‰€æœ‰ç»„ä»¶çš„çŠ¶æ€ï¼Œå¹¶ä»¥ç›¸åº”çš„è§„åˆ™ä¿è¯çŠ¶æ€ä»¥ä¸€ç§å¯é¢„æµ‹çš„æ–¹å¼å‘ç”Ÿå˜åŒ–ã€‚Vuex ä¹Ÿé›†æˆåˆ° Vue çš„å®˜æ–¹è°ƒè¯•å·¥å…· devtools extensionï¼Œæä¾›äº†è¯¸å¦‚é›¶é…ç½®çš„ time-travel è°ƒè¯•ã€çŠ¶æ€å¿«ç…§å¯¼å…¥å¯¼å‡ºç­‰é«˜çº§è°ƒè¯•åŠŸèƒ½ã€‚

        # å®‰è£…

        å®‰è£…ç¨³å®šç‰ˆ

        npm install vuex --save
# or
yarn add vuex

        # åŸºæœ¬åº”ç”¨

        src ç›®å½•ä¸‹åˆ›å»º store æ–‡ä»¶å¤¹ï¼Œ store æ–‡ä»¶å¤¹ä¸‹åˆ›å»º store.js

        src
â””â”€â”€ store
   â”œâ”€â”€ modules
   â”‚     â”œâ”€â”€ app.js
   â”‚     â””â”€â”€ user.js
   â”œâ”€â”€  getters.js
   â””â”€â”€  index.js

        // index.js
import Vue from 'vue'
import Vuex from 'vuex'
import app from './modules/app'
import user from './modules/user'
import getters from './getters'

Vue.use(Vuex)
const store = new Vuex.Store({
  modules: {
    app,
    user
  },
  getters
})

export default store

        // getters.js
const getters = {
  device: state => state.app.device,
  location: state => state.app.location,
  signature: state => state.user.signature,
  uid: state => state.user.uid,
}
export default getters

        // modules/app.js
const app = {
  state: {
    device: 'h5',
    location: null
  },
  mutations: {
    SET_DEVICE: (state, str) => {
      state.device = str
    },
    SET_LOCATION: (state, obj) => {
      state.location = obj
    },
  },
  actions: {
    SetDevice({ commit }, str) {
      commit('SET_DEVICE', str)
    },
    SetLocation({ commit }, obj) {
      commit('SET_LOCATION', obj)
    }
  }
}

export default app

        æ·»åŠ åˆ° main.js

        // main.js
import Vue from 'vue'
import App from './App.vue'
import router from './router'
import store from './store'

Vue.config.productionTip = false

new Vue({
  render: h => h(App),
  router,
  store,
}).$mount('#app')

        ç»„ä»¶ä¸­ä½¿ç”¨getter

        import { mapGetters } from "vuex";

export default {
  name: "Home",
  data() {
    return {
      msg: "Welcome to Your Vue.js App",
    };
  },
  created() {
    //
  },
  computed: {
    ...mapGetters([
      "location",
      "device"
      // ...
    ])
  },
  mounted() {
    //
  },
  methods: {
    //
  }
};

        ç»„ä»¶ä¸­ä½¿ç”¨dispatch





















        Â 






        import { mapGetters } from "vuex";

export default {
  name: "Home",
  data() {
    return {
      msg: "Welcome to Your Vue.js App",
    };
  },
  created() {
    //
  },
  computed: {
    ...mapGetters([
      "location",
      "device"
      // ...
    ])
  },
  mounted() {
    this.$store.dispatch('SetDevice', 'ios')
  },
  methods: {
    //
  }
};

        # æœ€å ğŸ“Œ

        ğŸ¶ å¼€å§‹å¿«ä¹çš„å†™é¡µé¢å§ï¼

        Last Updated: 4/20/2021, 11:12:15 AM
